oai_dc:dc.dc:title: University of Tennessee Knoxville
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Knoxville -- Barbara Blount Hall. -- Tennessee State University.” Black-and-white image (sepia-toned) of vine-covered building.

“Miss Olive Connable -- 92 N. Belvedere Blvd. -- Memphis -- Tenn. -- What do you mean by -- owing some letters? Will -- write a long letter to-morrow – was thinking -- of writing Abbie and -- asking her a question. -- Will be home in about -- a month and a half and -- hope you will not have -- forgotten me. -- H.”
